unnormalised: A fire broke out at 12A, Shankar Nagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra, 440010, late last night, engulfing the entire building. Locals spotted the blaze around 11:30 PM and immediately alerted the fire brigade. Initial reports suggest a short circuit may have been the cause.
normalised: A fire broke out at twelve A, Shankar Nagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra, four hundred and forty thousand and ten, late last night, engulfing the entire building. Locals spotted the blaze around eleven thirty P M and immediately alerted the fire brigade. Initial reports suggest a short circuit may have been the cause.

unnormalised: Residents of the building, located at Flat No. G-3, Sai Apartments, Near VNIT College, Hingna Road, Nagpur, 440016, were quickly evacuated. Fortunately, there were no casualties, though several suffered minor injuries while escaping.
normalised: Residents of the building, located at Flat Number G-three, Sai Apartments, Near V-N-I-T College, Hingna Road, Nagpur, four hundred and forty thousand and sixteen, were quickly evacuated. Fortunately, there were no casualties, though several suffered minor injuries while escaping.

unnormalised: "It was terrifying," said Mrs. Sharma, whose address is listed as 5/B, Tilak Nagar, Nagpur, Pin: 440010. "We barely made it out with our lives. Everything we own is gone." She added, "We've lived at this address since 2005!"
normalised: "It was terrifying," said Missus Sharma, whose address is listed as five slash B, Tilak Nagar, Nagpur, Pin: four hundred and forty thousand and ten. "We barely made it out with our lives. Everything we own is gone." She added, "We've lived at this address since two thousand and five!"

unnormalised: The fire department, with support from local volunteers, managed to control the situation by 3:00 AM. An investigation is underway to determine the exact cause of the fire.
normalised: The fire department, with support from local volunteers, managed to control the situation by three zero zero A M. An investigation is underway to determine the exact cause of the fire.

unnormalised: Authorities are providing temporary shelter to the affected families at the community hall near Plot No. 2, Shivaji Nagar, Nagpur - 440010. Donations and support are pouring in from across the city.
normalised: Authorities are providing temporary shelter to the affected families at the community hall near Plot Number two, Shivaji Nagar, Nagpur - four hundred and forty thousand and ten. Donations and support are pouring in from across the city.
